choose.when: SELECT depid1,depidNM FROM globalbiz.ComDepartMst WHERE jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND depid1 = #{depid1} AND stateCD = '1'

SELECT depid1,depidNM FROM globalbiz.ComDepartMst WHERE jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND packCD in (SELECT packCD FROM globalbiz.ComDepartMst WHERE jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND depid1 = #{depid1} AND stateCD = '1') AND stateCD = '1';
choose.otherwise: SELECT depid1,depidNM FROM globalbiz.ComDepartMst WHERE jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND depid1 != '00000' AND stateCD = '1'

mapper.select: SELECT empKey, empName FROM globalbiz.ComEmpMst WHERE jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND depid1=#{depid1} AND (stateCD = '1' OR (stateCD = '2' AND LEFT(rYMD, 7) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m'))) ORDER BY empKeyLvCD DESC, empKey asc
